summary: If you use the xbox360-controller with the pc-version you normally have only two hotkeys for your favourites. Those are *Left* and *Right* on the d-pad. This file adds 6 more on the d-pad to that. Also you can now quicksave, quickload and take screenshots and more with your controller. Support for Lefthanded People
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=green]-----===>) WHAT IS THIS (<===-----[/color]
[/b]If you use the xbox360-controller with the pc-version you normally have only two hotkeys for your favourites. Those are *Left* and *Right* on the d-pad. You hold those and assign them to items, spells or shouts that way.

This file adds 6 more on the D-pad to that. The new hotkeys are:

[b]D-pad-Up
D-pad-Down
LB + D-pad-Left
LB + D-pad-Right
LB + D-pad-Up
LB + D-pad-Down[/b]

You have to enter the [b]Favourites Menu[/b] by pressing [b]Back[/b] on your Controller.
If you want to [b]Wait[/b] you have to press [b]LB+Back[/b].

For the [b]Quicksave Function[/b] you have to press [b]X+B[/b]. Hold X then press B. Quicksaved :)
To [b]Quickload[/b] press [b]A+Y[/b]

[b]Taking Screenshots[/b] happens by pressing [b]LB+Start[/b]
To Autowalk press [b]LB+Right Stick[/b]

There is also another Version for Lefthanded People where I swapped Looking and Moving

[b][color=green]-----===>) TROUBLESHOOTING (<===-----[/color]
Delete the ControlMap_Custom.txt in your Skyrim mainfolder.[/b]

[b][color=green]-----===>) INSTALLATION (<===-----[/color]
[/b]To Install, just extract the zip inside your Skyrim-Data-folder under X:programssteamsteamappscommonskyrimData. Or just use the Nexus Mod Manager.

To be able to make screenshots add this in your skyrim.ini under C:/users/documents/my games/skyrim
[Display]
bAllowScreenshot=1

[b][color=green]-----===>) DEINSTALLATION (<===-----[/color]
[/b]Just delete the file controlmap.txt in X:programssteamsteamappscommonskyrimDataInterfaceControlsPC. Or use the Nexus Mod Manager.

To be able to make screenshots add this in your skyrim.ini under C:/users/documents/my games/skyrim

[Display]
bAllowScreenshot=1

---
Also available in the Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=212383355
author: Waldkoenig
